messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] The Last Samurai/Satsuma Rebellion
messages.msgSnippet: There is something to be said for including at least part of the previous message.  I m afraid I have to ask the source for what ? Between work and home, I
messages.messageBody:
There is something to be said for including at least part of the previous
message. I'm afraid I have to ask "the source for what"?

Between work and home, I get well over 200 e-mails a day and I can't always
remember what I've written to whom.

If you will remind me of what I wrote, I'd be happy to track down the source
for you.

Bob Burke


In a message dated 12/17/03 5:17:45 PM, junkmail@... writes:

<< Bob-
Tantalizing little piece, would love to know your source. Especially
the bit about the swords. Satsuma "rebellion" swords are often seen and
dismissed for their low quality. I had however never heard that they
were from the arsenal at Kagoshima, which would add a delicious new
wrinkle to the story...
-t
>>

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] The Last Samurai/Satsuma Rebellion
messages.msgSnippet: Bob- Tantalizing little piece, would love to know your source. Especially the bit about the swords. Satsuma rebellion swords are often seen and dismissed for
messages.messageBody:
Bob-
Tantalizing little piece, would love to know your source. Especially
the bit about the swords. Satsuma "rebellion" swords are often seen and
dismissed for their low quality. I had however never heard that they
were from the arsenal at Kagoshima, which would add a delicious new
wrinkle to the story...
-t

messages.subject: The Last Samurai/Satsuma Rebellion
messages.msgSnippet: I can t remember if I have posted this link before or not, so if I have, please bear with me (although the newer members of the group may find it interesting).
messages.messageBody:
I can't remember if I have posted this link before or not, so if I have,
please bear with me (although the newer members of the group may find it
interesting).

Follow this link and you will find an article I wrote back in 1991 about the
historical Satsuma Rebellion (that's how long I've been researching this
period of Japanese history.

http://www.russojapanesewar.com/satsuma.html

Bob Burke
